articles.title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons Will Seemingly Stop Functioning in 2061 - IGN
articles.description: If you're planning on playing Animal Crossing: New Horizons for decades longer, just be aware that the game will seemingly stop functioning in 2061.
articles.content:
